testcase.classname: As a User I want to test Add to cart product and checkout functionality
testcase.name: Verify user add product into cart and complete checkout scenario - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I Log into the Demo application.......................................passed When I Click on shop menu...................................................passed And I Add book "HTML5 Forms" into cart......................................passed And I Add book "Functional Programming in JS" into cart.....................passed And I Click on cart icon and move to basket page............................passed And I Store the total amount of products....................................passed And I Click on proceed to checkout button...................................passed And I Click on place order button...........................................passed Then I Verify order confirmation message....................................passed Then I Verify the total amount is correct...................................passed
